metaphors.title: Interweaving Architectural Blueprints
metaphors.metaphor: Two distinct but complementary AI frameworks combine to create a more robust collaborative protocol ecosystem.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Co-creation with clear structural overlap and room for divergence

metaphors.title: Resonant Echo Chambers
metaphors.metaphor: A shared space where diverse voices bounce and blend, shaping meaning through interaction and resonance.
